restaurants.name: Baked Ziti
restaurants.directions:
Mix spaghetti sauce, water, milk, and cottage cheese in a large
    mixing bowl. Mix in raw ziti. Pour into a large casserole and bake, covered,
    at 400 degrees C. Uncover and top with mozzerella. Bake for 5 more minutes,
    uncovered. Yummy!

restaurants.name: Cornflakes
restaurants.directions:
Pour the cornflakes into a big cereal bowl. Pour the milk on
    top. Yummy!
